reviews.review: Eğer iyi bir hikaye , efsane ve şu anki oyunlara göre efsane olan mekanik , iyi grafikler , iyi oynanış istiyorsanız bu oyun size göre .Evet 3 üncü oyunu çıksa herşey daha güzel olucak ama maalesef :(.Eğer oyuna bir kere başladıysanız daha da duramassınız ve hikayesi bitince üzülürsünüz .Bir daha piyasaya böyle bir oyun gelmicek o yüzden bence bu oyunu satın alın, kuruşuna kadar değer .Şu anki PUBG olsun , CS:GO olsun hiç biri bu oyunu geçemez.

An amazing sequel in where you  step back into the suit of [strike] Morgan [/strike] Gordon Freeman. With interesting enemy and level variety it's going to be hard to get bored playing this amazing title. 

However, the weapon selection is more lacking from the previous title which may make some classic shooter fans dissapointed.

New mechanic of squad leading has been added and offers a little twist into what is an otherwise normal fps, great buy.

I played the first Half Life game probably sometime between 2000 and 2002.  Now 2019, almost 20 years later, I'm finally digging into the sequel.  That same sense of action and urgency I got from the original game is right back with me as I, once again, hop into the shoes of Gordon Freeman.  I have played about 10 hours so far and am constantly wanting to find out what happens next.  It's not a walk in the park either.  Playing on the normal setting, I'm often playing a few sections over and again.  My natural impulse to jump in guns a-blazing doesn't always work.  Finding creative solutions to get past a horde of enemies is super rewarding.  Here's hoping that Half Life 3 will someday be a thing!

What can I say about this game that has not been said already? If you have not played it yet, and if you enjoy FPS games, If you enjoy Sci Fi, If you have a pulse, then you need to play it right now!
There are amazing games and then there are masterpieces of Art. Half Life 2 is the latter. There is a reason why everyone and their Grandmothers want Valve to release Half Life 3. The atmosphere, The ambiance, The feeling of being immersed in an amazing Sci Fi story, the air of mystery of what is to come, Half Life 2 takes all of that, and turns it into one of the most memorable and best experiences you can get on a computer game.

Years after its release, the graphics show their age a bit, but they have aged well. From the dark alleys of Ravenholm to the vast open spaces of Highway 17, Half Life 2 is a journey into a world that feels  bleak and hopeless, yet so lived in, so alive and hauntingly beautiful at times. 

I just wish that they finish the story with Half Life 3 soon.

Конечно, сейчас Half-Life 2 - не более, чем просто "прикольная игрушка" из давних времен, которая, однако, вызывает сильнейшую ностальгию и прочие теплые чувства. Но мы полюбили её, полюбили очень сильно, потому что именно в своё время эта игра была бомбой, а не игрой. Сюжет до сих пор остаётся интригующим, увлекательным и глубоким. Геймплей размеренный, равномерный. Локации меняются вовремя, не надоедая. Везде встречается элемент головоломки и шутера, и происходит это грамотно, не смешиваясь в кашу. Чего уж говорить о графике и работе движка! На момент выхода этой игры они были потрясны, и оставались такими еще много лет. 
   Насколько бы крутыми, инновационными, графонистыми и т.д. не были сейчас новые игры, Халва 2 всё равно будет одной из моих лучших игр и любимейших, в которые мне посчастливилось сыграть.
